name: Ultra FPS Profile
description: Maximize your FPS with optimized rendering flags for competitive gaming. This profile disables unnecessary visual effects and optimizes rendering pipeline for maximum performance.

flags.name: DFFlagDisablePostFx
flags.description: Disables post-processing effects for better performance

flags.name: FIntRenderShadowIntensity
flags.description: Disables shadows completely

flags.name: FIntDebugForceMSAASamples
flags.description: Reduces anti-aliasing for better FPS

flags.name: FFlagDebugGraphicsDisableDirect3D11
flags.description: Forces a more modern graphics API for potential performance gains

flags.name: FFlagDebugGraphicsPreferVulkan
flags.description: Prefers the Vulkan renderer for higher performance

flags.name: DFIntTaskSchedulerTargetFps
flags.description: Sets a high target FPS for the task scheduler

flags.name: FFlagEnableFPSAndFrameTime
flags.description: Enables FPS and frame time monitoring

flags.name: DFFlagDisableMemoryTracking
flags.description: Disables memory tracking to reduce overhead

name: Low-Latency Profile
description: Reduce network latency for competitive gaming with ping optimization and network tweaks.

flags.name: DFIntMaxReceiveToDeserializeLatencyMilliseconds
flags.description: Minimizes latency for processing incoming network data

flags.name: DFIntNetworkStopProducingPacketsToProcessThresholdMs
flags.description: Reduces the threshold for stopping packet processing

flags.name: DFIntMaxWaitTimeBeforeForcePacketProcessMS
flags.description: Minimizes wait time before forcing packet processing

flags.name: DFIntClientPacketMaxDelayMs
flags.description: Manages the maximum delay for client packets

flags.name: DFFlagHttpTrackSyncWriteCachePhase
flags.description: Tracks sync write cache phase for network optimization

name: Graphics Enhanced Profile
description: Unlock advanced graphics features and visual enhancements for the best visual experience.

flags.name: FIntRenderShadowIntensity
flags.description: Enables high-quality shadows

flags.name: FIntDebugForceMSAASamples
flags.description: Enables 8x MSAA for maximum anti-aliasing

flags.name: FFlagRenderLanczosUpsamplingNonRinging2
flags.description: Uses high-quality Lanczos upsampling for better image clarity

flags.name: DFFlagTextureQualityOverrideEnabled
flags.description: Allows overriding texture quality

flags.name: DFIntTextureQualityOverride
flags.description: Sets the highest texture quality

flags.name: FFlagExtendedLightRanges2
flags.description: Enables extended light ranges for more realistic lighting

flags.name: FFlagRenderInitShadowmaps
flags.description: Initializes shadow maps for better shadow rendering

flags.name: FFlagSimCSG4EnableMesh
flags.description: Enables more detailed and complex meshes
